titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: Norman Learner (1915-2003) received his M.D. from Temple University Medical School in 1939 and was a resident at Temple University Hospital, 1939-1941. Learner was a member of the Philadelphia County Medical Society and the American College of Physicians. He specialized in internal medicine.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of the papers of Norman Learner. Materials include: school essays; his Master of Science thesis; medical reprints; army certificates; notes from pharmacology experiments in medical school; and papers from the court case Fante vs. Learner.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.
